title: btcnope
author: btcnope
content: Website: https://tirex.networkExplorer: https://cn.tirexscan.networkGithub: https://github.com/TirexNetworkMining: https://mining.tirex.cashWallets:Windows: https://github.com/TirexNetwork/tirex/releases/download/1.0.0/TirexWallet_for_Windows.zipLinux: https://github.com/TirexNetwork/tirex/releases/download/1.0.0/TirexWallet_for_Linux.tarMiner: CPU-XMRIG - https://github.com/xmrig/xmrig/releases/tag/v3.2.0CPU-XMRSTAK: - https://github.com/fireice-uk/xmr-stak/releasesGPU-NVIDIA-XMRIG: - https://github.com/xmrig/xmrig-nvidia/releasesGPU-AMD-XMRIG: - https://github.com/xmrig/xmrig-amd/releasesConfig XMrig Miner: Code:    {    “api”: {        “id”: null,        “worker-id”: null    },    “http”: {        “enabled”: false,        “host”: “127.0.0.1”,        “port”: 0,        “access-token”: null,        “restricted”: true    },    “autosave”: true,    “version”: 1,    “background”: false,    “colors”: true,    “randomx”: {        “init”: -1,        “numa”: true    },    “cpu”: {        “enabled”: true,        “huge-pages”: true,        “hw-aes”: null,        “priority”: null,        “asm”: true,        “argon2-impl”: null,        “cn/0”: true,        “cn-lite/0”: true    },    “donate-level”: 1,    “donate-over-proxy”: 1,    “log-file”: null,    “pools”: [        {            “algo”: “cryptonight”,            “coin”: null,            “url”: “connect.tirex.cash:3333”,            “user”: “YOUR_ADDRESS”,            “pass”: “x”,            “rig-id”: null,            “nicehash”: false,            “keepalive”: false,            “enabled”: true,            “tls”: false,            “tls-fingerprint”: null,            “daemon”: false        }    ],    “print-time”: 60,    “retries”: 5,    “retry-pause”: 5,    “syslog”: false,    “user-agent”: null,    “watch”: true}

comments.author: Joan_linker
comments.body: Let's say.I mine your coin.Where can I sell it?!

comments.author: Joan_linker
comments.created_time: May 11, 2022, 03:37:04 PMLast edit: May 11, 2022, 03:56:01 PM by Joan_linker

comments.author: Tirex-Network
comments.body: Quote from: Joan_linker on May 11, 2022, 03:07:32 PMLet's say.I mine your coin.Where can I sell it?!You can see the roadmap on our website https://tirex.network

comments.author: Tirex-Network
comments.body: Soon you will get a lot of good impressions! Because with us from the start!

comments.author: 24Kt
comments.body: Quote from: Tirex-Network on May 11, 2022, 03:57:30 PMQuote from: Joan_linker on May 11, 2022, 03:07:32 PMLet's say.I mine your coin.Where can I sell it?!You can see the roadmap on our website https://tirex.networkThere is no timeline on your roadmap though. Anyway, what do you think will be your main advantage over the other existing DEXs today? Initially, it is hard to get the liquidity of the trading pairs you would want to list. So do you think you can provide the liquidity needed for your traders to get the low commission?

comments.author: Tirex-Network
comments.body: Quote from: 24Kt on May 11, 2022, 11:01:49 PMQuote from: Tirex-Network on May 11, 2022, 03:57:30 PMQuote from: Joan_linker on May 11, 2022, 03:07:32 PMLet's say.I mine your coin.Where can I sell it?!You can see the roadmap on our website https://tirex.networkThere is no timeline on your roadmap though. Anyway, what do you think will be your main advantage over the other existing DEXs today? Initially, it is hard to get the liquidity of the trading pairs you would want to list. So do you think you can provide the liquidity needed for your traders to get the low commission?First of all, I will tell you that we are a legitimate project. At the moment, our exchange is under development, it will be decentralized. We'll post development screenshots soon. Regarding your question, the advantage over other DEXs will be low fees and hassle-free deposits and withdrawals (no support involved). We will be able to provide sufficient liquidity to ensure low fees, moreover, we are not going to put a commission for trading on our exchange at all, because it will be completely decentralized.

comments.author: miloioer55
comments.body: I don’t see any problems, everyone has false alerts, the project is clear that it’s not bad, I’ll be watching

comments.author: Miiike
comments.body: Quote from: miloioer55 on May 12, 2022, 10:01:37 AMI don’t see any problems, everyone has false alerts, the project is clear that it’s not bad, I’ll be watchingThe above post shows a scan result with a trojan detection. Although there is yet any specific info about the trojan in subject, it doesn't change the fact that their file is not clean enough.What I am more interested is why you feel the need to create an alt new account just to make the statement?

comments.author: Tirex-Network
comments.body: Quote from: Miiike on May 12, 2022, 04:07:52 PMQuote from: miloioer55 on May 12, 2022, 10:01:37 AMI don’t see any problems, everyone has false alerts, the project is clear that it’s not bad, I’ll be watchingThe above post shows a scan result with a trojan detection. Although there is yet any specific info about the trojan in subject, it doesn't change the fact that their file is not clean enough.What I am more interested is why you feel the need to create an alt new account just to make the statement?We believe that no project should overlap with another. Therefore, a new account is always welcome. As for your link, yes, there may indeed be false positives, but I assure you that we have a clean project. Very soon we will post screenshots of the development of our exchange and you will see for yourself that we are a legitimate project.In the meantime, you can visit any of our threads on the forums.Code:https://www.emoneyspace.com/forum/index.php/topic,534702.0.htmlhttps://bitcoingarden.org/forum/index.php?topic=116798.new#newhttps://www.altcoinstalks.com/index.php?topic=266958.0https://carigold.com/forum/threads/ann-tirex-coin-exchange-cryptonight-switching-tirex-network-bsc.745926/https://mmo4me.com/threads/ann-tirex-coin-exchange-cryptonight-switching-tirex-network-bsc.443415/https://www.jackobian.com/threads/ann-tirex-coin-exchange-cryptonight-switching-tirex-network-bsc.152944/https://bitcoinforum.com/altcoin-announcements/(ann)-(tirex-coin)-(exchange)-(cryptonight(switching)tirex-network-bsc)/new/#newhttps://topgoldforum.com/topic/380170-ann-tirex-coin-exchange-cryptonightswitchingtirex-network-bsc/http://www.dreamteammoney.com/index.php?showtopic=699154https://exchangecurrencyzone.com/threads/ann-tirex-coin-exchange-cryptonight-switching-tirex-network-bsc.286056/https://exchangecurrencyzone.com/threads/ann-tirex-coin-exchange-cryptonight-switching-tirex-network-bsc.286056/https://forumbitcoin.co.id/threads/ann-tirex-coin-exchange-cryptonight-switching-tirex-network-bsc.158582/https://www.rolclub.com/advertising/3749540-ann-tirex-coin-exchange-cryptonight-switching-tirex-network-bsc.htmlhttps://cryptotalk.org/topic/361982-ann-tirex-coin-exchange-cryptonightswitchingtirex-network-bsc/https://investsocial.com/forum/free-discussion/advertisement/17965887-ann-tirex-coin-exchange-cryptonight-switching-tirex-network-bschttps://www.earnlib.com/d/4870-ann-tirex-coin-exchange-cryptonight-switching-tirex-network-bschttps://www.mmopro.org/altcoin-announcement/40491-[ann]-[tirex-coin]-[exchange]-[cryptonight-switching-%7Ctirex-network%7C-bsc].htmlhttps://forum.cryptoff.org/index.php?/topic/24501-ann-tirex-coin-exchange-cryptonightswitchingtirex-network-bsc/https://thecryptocurrencyforums.com/community/threads/ann-tirex-coin-exchange-cryptonight-switching-tirex-network-bsc.4685/http://www.hyipstalk.com/threads/ann-tirex-coin-exchange-cryptonight-switching-tire comments.author: SpeedyDale08
comments.body: If the pool is up and running, why does XMRig 6.17.0 only return invalid shares? I have been banned twice for 5 minutes.My Bat File: -a cn-pico -o connect.tirex.cash:4444 -u solo:TRXuhz4KyadLgrwvUf5RYVEWLZKGmHDYCJLCMDe5NyH1YrBwP7iYexoex1U1K2V4ua45K1xTxrSJrLV Wtcn76Nip1Mv9fLNVS6 -p Rippin32

comments.author: Tirex-Network
comments.body: Quote from: SpeedyDale08 on May 16, 2022, 12:38:38 PMIf the pool is up and running, why does XMRig 6.17.0 only return invalid shares? I have been banned twice for 5 minutes.My Bat File: -a cn-pico -o connect.tirex.cash:4444 -u solo:TRXuhz4KyadLgrwvUf5RYVEWLZKGmHDYCJLCMDe5NyH1YrBwP7iYexoex1U1K2V4ua45K1xTxrSJrLV Wtcn76Nip1Mv9fLNVS6 -p Rippin32You need to use the version of XMRIG 3.2 https://github.com/xmrig/xmrig/releases/tag/v3.2.0The bat file indicates the following:Code:-a cryptonight -o connect.tirex.cash:4444 -u solo: TRXuhz4KyadLgrwvUf5RYVEWLZKGmHDYCJLCMDe5NyH1YrBwP7iYexoex1U1K2V4ua45K1xTxrSJrLVWtcn76Nip1Mv9fLNVS6 -p Rippin32If it didn't help: the config is indicated in the topic.

comments.author: SpeedyDale08
comments.body: Quote from: Tirex-Network on May 16, 2022, 01:38:44 PMQuote from: SpeedyDale08 on May 16, 2022, 12:38:38 PMIf the pool is up and running, why does XMRig 6.17.0 only return invalid shares? I have been banned twice for 5 minutes.My Bat File: -a cn-pico -o connect.tirex.cash:4444 -u solo:TRXuhz4KyadLgrwvUf5RYVEWLZKGmHDYCJLCMDe5NyH1YrBwP7iYexoex1U1K2V4ua45K1xTxrSJrLV Wtcn76Nip1Mv9fLNVS6 -p Rippin32You need to use the version of XMRIG 3.2 https://github.com/xmrig/xmrig/releases/tag/v3.2.0The bat file indicates the following:Code:-a cryptonight -o connect.tirex.cash:4444 -u solo: TRXuhz4KyadLgrwvUf5RYVEWLZKGmHDYCJLCMDe5NyH1YrBwP7iYexoex1U1K2V4ua45K1xTxrSJrLVWtcn76Nip1Mv9fLNVS6 -p Rippin32If it didn't help: the config is indicated in the topic.Thank you for correcting my bonehead mistake!

comments.author: Tirex-Network
comments.body: Quote from: jiucai2008 on May 16, 2022, 03:48:52 PMincompatible/disabled algorithm "cn/0" detected, reconnectIf you are using Xmrig version 3.2, please use config.json instead of .bat. You can take the configuration for config.json in the header of this topic, just do not forget that the following line is indicated in config.json in the "true" position:cn/0: true
